messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR ANDREW GARNETT
messages.content:
If elected it will be a privilege to serve the community in which I was born, brought up and educated in. I will work to ensure that all Wavertree residents have equality of opportunity.
Andrew has a strong record of service in local government, who will be a plain speaking representative for Wavertree and will represent all residents, regardless of ethnic origin, faith or political belief.
I pledge to work in partnership with the police and residents in our City to ensure we protect our most vulnerable residents. I pledge to fight against crime and anti-social behaviour a top priority.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that all Wavertree residents have equality of opportunity.
Provide a strong record of service in local government and be a plain speaking representative for all residents.
Work in partnership with the police and protect the most vulnerable residents by making the fight against crime and anti-social behaviour a top priority.

leaflet.personalStatement: If elected it will be a privilege to serve the community in which I was born, brought up and educated in. I will work to ensure that all Wavertree residents have equality of opportunity.

contactInformation.address: City of Liverpool Conservatives, First Floor, Hanover Buildings, 11-13 Hanover Street, Liverpool, L1 3DN.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet seems to focus on local governance and community issues rather than wider political concerns, hence the lack of explicit mentions of broader topics such as Brexit or the economy.
